item.title: Keepitem: keeping the worst item?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Here is the keepItem method

public void keepItem1() { for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { int highest = 0; int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i)); if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) { highest = value; keepItem = playerItems[i]-1; keepItemAmount = playerItemsN[i]; } } }
But this keeps the worst item you have instead of the best?

Read full topic
